title: What Causes Poor Quality of Online Streaming Media Played by the Phone?
answer:
The source streaming media is of poor quality.
? The network connection is poor.
? The phone's hardware is faulty, for example, the phone display is damaged. In this case,
use another device to play the online streaming media for contrast purposes.
? The phone's RAM is insufficient.
? The central processing unit (CPU) usage is high.
? Too many applications are running.
